name: Doctor Who
description: Travel through time and space with the Doctor! Four Commander decks featuring iconic characters and moments from the legendary British sci-fi series.

name: Fallout
description: Survive the wasteland with decks inspired by the post-apocalyptic video game franchise. Features radiation counters, energy weapons, and vault-dwelling strategies.

name: Final Fantasy
description: Experience the magic and adventure of Final Fantasy with iconic characters, summons, and legendary moments from the beloved JRPG series.

name: The Lord of the Rings
description: Journey to Middle-earth with hobbits, elves, and epic quests. Features the Ring mechanic, legendary heroes, and massive battles.

name: Warhammer 40,000
description: In the grim darkness of the far future, there is only war. Command armies of Space Marines, Tyranids, Necrons, and Chaos forces.

name: Transformers
description: Robots in disguise! Transform between vehicle and robot modes with Optimus Prime, Megatron, and the eternal battle between Autobots and Decepticons.

name: The Walking Dead
description: Survive the zombie apocalypse with iconic characters from the hit TV series. Secret Lair exclusive cards.

name: Stranger Things
description: Explore the Upside Down with Eleven, Mike, Dustin, and the gang. Secret Lair exclusive cards featuring beloved characters.

name: Street Fighter
description: Hadouken! Secret Lair cards featuring iconic fighting game characters like Ryu, Chun-Li, and more.

name: Fortnite
description: Victory Royale! Secret Lair cards from the battle royale phenomenon.
